name: Akademi Çevre's Recycling Game
description:
In this game, your goal is separate the garbage! 

Drag the platform to right point and push the "Dumb the Garbage" button. If you platforms dragged to right point, you will see that the garbage will go to the right bin.

•Plastic Garbage -> Plastic Basket

•Metal Garbage -> Metal Basket

etc.

Why I developed this game?

I developed it for encourage childeren to recycling.

How to play this game?

1- First download this rar file.

2- Extract the files on your desktop.

3- Click the "AkademiCevre-Recycling Game.exe".

Have fun.
